job.title: Web Developer
job.description: FocusKPI, Inc. is looking for a Web Developer/ Tagging Specialist to work for our client in Boston, MA. This is a full-time contract position.<br><br><strong>Responsibilities:<br></strong><ul><li>Leading communication between the web analytics and data engineering teams and efficiently managing pixel/tag implementation requests within a tag manager (TealiumIQ)</li><li>Use browser web debugging tools to perform tag validation and QA</li><li>Perform Tagging audits/data integrity checks on a regular basis to have better control over the tags deployed across the sites</li><li>Document and maintain a copy of tagging requests from the different teams</li><li>Use mobile proxy tools like Charles/Fiddler to validate analytics tagging across mobile applications and mobile web tagging</li><li>Collaborate with different vendors (marketing, social media, affiliates, etc.) to understand different analytics implementation techniques and suggest implementation best practices based on well-defined organization standards <br><br></li></ul><strong>Qualifications:<br></strong><ul><li>3+ years of years of web development/web analytics implementation experience.</li><li>Experienced in managing the backend tagging process and working with tag management tools (Tealium, Google Tag Manager, DTM/Adobe Launch). Tealium experience is a plus.</li><li>Strong frontend HTML5, CSS, Javascript &amp; jQuery experience.</li><li>Experience working with browser debugging tools(UDO debugger, network tools, wasp, etc.).</li><li>Experience working with analytics tools such as Google analytics, Adobe analytics.</li><li>Experience working in an agile environment and with tools like JIRA<br></li></ul>Thank you!<br><br>FocusKPI Hiring Team<br><br>Founded in 2010, FocusKPI, Inc. (FocusKPI) is a data science and technology firm specializing in predictive analytics practice and methodologies. FocusKPI is a US company headquartered in Silicon Valley, California with an East Coast office in Boston, Massachusetts.<br><br>Powered by JazzHR<br><br>PKS0gKiRud
